criterion.name: Residential
criterion.description: Residential Customers in individual private dwellings

criterion.name: Phases
criterion.description: Residential Customers: Continuous - Alternating Current, 60 Cycle; 120, 120/208, or 120/240 Volts - Single Phase.

meteredServiceCharge.description: The Delivery Charge that appears on the customer’s bill is the sum of the Energy Charge plus the Make-Whole Charge. Effective May 1, 2026, the Make-Whole Rate shall expire and the Delivery Charge that appears on the customer’s bill shall not include the Make-Whole Rate.

ratePlan.tariffUtilityName: New York State Electric & Gas Corporation
ratePlan.ratePlanName: Service Classification No. 1 - ESCO Supply Service (ESS)
ratePlan.ratePlanDescription: Upon request, customers who, during a period of six or more consecutive months, make only occasional (compared to the balance of the year) or no use of electric service at their premises may have their service maintained throughout the period, not to exceed eight months, and shall be billed for the kWh consumed during this period at the following unit prices per kWh: The Delivery Charge that appears on the customer’s bill is the sum of the Energy Charge plus the Make-Whole Charge. Effective 11/01/23: The total bill for delivery service, however, for the year shall in no case be less than $228.00 plus actual billed Bill Issuance Charges.

Effective 11/01/23: The total bill for delivery service, however, for the year shall in no case be less than $228.00 plus actual billed Bill Issuance Charges.
